info.title: DX Personalization REST APIs
info.description:
This gives you access to personalization features through REST services.

Currently APIs are developed for Visibility Rule and Profiler rule types. APIs are in beta stage at this time - changes are possible until finalized.

parameters.name: Cookie
parameters.description: Contains the access or authentication token. Leave this field empty if you are already authenticated, unless you intend to put a token value.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The offset and limit parameters can be leveraged to limit the results - limit is the number of results which will be returned. (e.g. 10). Default is 30.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset and limit parameters can be leveraged to limit the results - limit is the number of results which will be returned. (e.g. 10). Default is 30.

parameters.name: depth
parameters.description:
Provide the keyword to perform search based on depth. (e.g. Children). [ Allowed Depth: Children, Descendants ]. 
 
 **NOTE:** Null depth value will result in same response as depth: descendants.

parameters.name: parent
parameters.description:
Provide folder for which the sub-folders to be queried. 
 
 **NOTE:** If the parent value is left empty it will fetch workspace and all the descendant/child folders present based on depth selected.

400.description: Returns the bad request error if the input parameters are missing/invalid.

get.summary: To get list of all folder details for the given parent Id.

parameters.name: Cookie
parameters.description: Contains the access or authentication token. Leave this field empty if you are already authenticated, unless you intend to put a token value.

parameters.name: Cookie
parameters.description: Contains the access or authentication token. Leave this field empty if you are already authenticated, unless you intend to put a token value.

get.summary: To get the individual folder details.

parameters.name: Cookie
parameters.description: Contains the access or authentication token. Leave this field empty if you are already authenticated, unless you intend to put a token value.

parameters.name: Cookie
parameters.description: Contains the access or authentication token. Leave this field empty if you are already authenticated, unless you intend to put a token value.

parameters.name: folder-id
parameters.description: Folder uuid.

parameters.name: Cookie
parameters.description: Contains the access or authentication token. Leave this field empty if you are already authenticated, unless you intend to put a token value.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The offset and limit parameters can be leveraged to limit the results - limit is the number of results which will be returned. (e.g. 10). Default is 30.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset and limit parameters can be leveraged to limit the results - offset is the starting point from which results will be returned. (e.g. 20). Default is 0.

parameters.name: ruleType
parameters.description: Provide the keyword to perform search based on rule type. (e.g. Visibility Rule). [ Allowed Rule Types: Visibilty Rule, Profiler ].

400.description: Returns the bad request error if the input parameters are missing/invalid.

parameters.name: Cookie
parameters.description: Contains the access or authentication token. Leave this field empty if you are already authenticated, unless you intend to put a token value.

post.description:
This API will create visibility rules.
Note: Allowed attribute types: BrowserCapability, Date, Device, Referrer, ActionBean, CategoryBean, Action Count, Category Count, User, Shared Render Parameters, Session, Shared Data, Portlet Attributes, Request, Profiler, Arithmetic and MatchingItems.

parameters.name: Cookie
parameters.description: Contains the access or authentication token. Leave this field empty if you are already authenticated, unless you intend to put a token value.

get.summary: To get the individual rule details.

parameters.name: Cookie
parameters.description: Contains the access or authentication token. Leave this field empty if you are already authenticated, unless you intend to put a token value.

parameters.name: rule-id
parameters.description: Rule uuid.

parameters.name: Cookie
parameters.description: Contains the access or authentication token. Leave this field empty if you are already authenticated, unless you intend to put a token value.

parameters.name: rule-id
parameters.description: Rule uuid.

caseInsensitive.description: Indication that the string comparisons in the rule are case insensitive.

stopFirstProfile.description: Indication that the rule returns the first matching profile for the current user.
